problem.problem_statement: How can we make sure that trees and plants we move to new places survive better?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can we monitor and check the health of water ecosystems?
problem.goalTitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

problem.problem_statement: What are the social and economic effects of frequent floods?
problem.goalTitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

problem.problem_statement: How can we stop cutting down so many trees?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: How can schools help protect plants and bees?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
